name: Senjaiko
description:
(I wasn't able to test the game on MacOs, so I don't know if there are are any bugs. The Windows version is fine!)

Senjaiko is a local 2 Player turn based strategy game, set in 3 cute and cartoonish islands. Your main goal is to destroy your  opponents castle. On the battlefield/ Island you can place 8 different and unique units, and do actions with them. The game includes 3 Islands (Golden Islands, Frozen Sea, Vulaava) + a tutorial that explains you the rules of the game.  Have fun playing with a friend or family member.

---------------------Credits--------------------

made by Daniel Muenstermann

Assets used:

All In 1 Shader

Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
